Text.Page:
As if our other enemies weren't enough, the mugato are attacking us. Show them how foolish that choice was.

Slay {@LinkCreature:34#900#frostguard mugatos} and their {@LinkCreature:34#910#cubs}, and {@LinkCreature:34#920#frostguard patriachs}.

Report to Kahuere when you've completed your task.

Mugato are pesky fiends. Cunning and tough, but not quick to learn.

Oh, well. You've taught them a lesson!
We need to stop the mugato attacks. Please get out there and show them what a nightmare fighting the federation can be!
